        removes user to the system.

      • userSignIn

        public static boolean userSignIn(java.lang.String userName,
                                 java.lang.String password)
        precondition: userName must be unique for all users.If not, output could be not as expected. signs in the user if password and userName matches. otherwise displays an error message.
        Parameters:
        userName - username of the user that wants to sign in
        password - entered password by the user
        Returns:
        true if the user signed in.else false
